entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
